Module io.inverno.mod.web
Package io.inverno.mod.web

Interface WebRouterConfigurer<A extends ExchangeContext>

Type Parameters:
A - the type of the exchange context

  • Method Details

    • createContext

      default A createContext()

      Creates a context matching routes requirement.

      This context supplier is used by the router to create a specific context attached to WebExchange required by the routes configured by the configurer.

      Returns:
      a new context instance
